replies.body: I hoped that steel legion garen{{champion:86}}  was on sale. or a yasuo{{champion:157}}  skin.
Blood Moon Yasuo will appear in the June early sales later in the month. Steel Legion Garen is also on the regular sale roster for this month so keep an eye out.
Has blood moon yasuo already gone on sale?

thanks guys i just bought steel legion garen 50% off <3
